title: Chicken Mulligatawny Soup
ingredients: ['50g butter', '30g sliced onion', '30g sliced carrots', '30g chopped celery', '35g chopped green pepper', '1 apple, peeled, cored and sliced', '225g chicken breast meat, chopped', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground mace', '4 whole cloves', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '250g tinned whole plum peeled tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '160g cooked white rice', '1.2 litres beef stock']
